item.description:
Manchester Community College will be screening the recently produced film American Jubilee by local filmmaker Ryan Casey. The film, which has appeared at several festivals, is the story of an American family in crisis.

 

The free screening will be on Friday, September 7th at 7:00pm in the SBM Charitable Auditorium on the MCC campus, same location as their International Film Series. Ryan Casey will be on hand to discuss the film and take questions. This is a wonderful opportunity to support independent filmmaking and the movie industry in Connecticut.

 

Here is a link to the film's website:   http://ajmovie.com/

And their Facebook page:  https://www.facebook.com/ajmovie

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "American Jubilee" @ MCC
